description: As a ML Platform Architect on the Central Software team, you will play a vital part in scaling machine learning (ML) efforts across Boston Dynamics. In this role, you’ll design the tools, infrastructure, and pipelines that unify how our many product ML/RL engineers and researchers get stuff done. You’ll work at the forefront of robotics innovation, using your skills to empower teams shipping new robot capabilities. How you will make an impact: Own the overall design and long-term growth of an ML platform, including data management, compute for model training, deployment, and optimization. Work closely with ML/RL contributors across teams to understand and prioritize needs Develop and propose strategies, leveraging on-premises and cloud-hosted resources, to address compute, storage, and networking capabilities for fast/flexible ML capabilities Propose and communicate roadmaps, schedules, and design concepts. Align stakeholders' direction and priorities Work closely with ML Platform engineers to implement, deploy, and maintain designed infrastructure Serve as a technical resource to stakeholders across BD pursuing ML-enabled solutions Work closely with engineering leadership to identify and answer critical product questions We are looking for: 8+ years experience as a ML platform engineer, Senior SWE / technical lead, or equivalent Experience effectively working in a large multi-language monorepos, including build technologies Proven track record developing, debugging, and deploying complex applications in Python, Julia, C++ or equivalent Demonstrated proficiency using ML libraries/frameworks (PyTorch, Tensorflow, Keras, Pandas, Numpy) Experience using hybrid infrastructure, combining on-prem and cloud (GCP, AWS, Azure) resources, for ML applications Demonstrated experience with scalable ML deployment methods (Docker, K8s, Ansible, Terraform) Experience with storage and data transformation technologies (S3, GCS, Airflow, Spark) Experience with Agile, Scrum or other lean methods. Be able to work closely with high performing engineering teams Ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams Masters in Engineering, Computer Science, or other technical area #LI-JM1 We are growing rapidly, building a commercial company that delivers cutting edge technology and solutions to our customers from industrial applications to logistics and warehouse solutions.
